properties.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 18 at 3:26PM CST until January 19 at 12:00PM CST by NWS St Louis MO
properties.description:
* WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as
15 below zero.

* WHERE...In northeast Missouri, Knox and Lewis counties. In west
central Illinois, Adams and Brown counties.

* WHEN...From midnight tonight to noon CST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia if
precautions are not taken.
properties.instruction:
A Wind Chill Advisory means that very cold air and strong winds
will combine to generate low wind chill values. This will result
in frost bite and lead to hypothermia if precautions are not
taken. If you must venture outdoors, make sure you wear a hat and
gloves, making sure all exposed skin is covered.

NWSheadline: WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO NOON CST SUNDAY
